An order of adjudication was passed on 14th May,

. 

At 

present 
a 
cash 
balance 
of 
Rs.2217.21 

ps. 

is

lying 
in 
the 
estate 
as 
against 
a

of

ps. 

and 
an 
unsecured 
liability 
of 

Rs.15680.50

ps. In the present case, no further recoveries are

possible.

.

The Official Assignee has prayed that the balance

amount 

of 

Rs.2217.21 

ps. 

may 
be 

transferred 

to 

the

unclaimed 

dividend 
capital 
account 
under 
Rule 
of

Bombay 

Insolvency 

Rules, 
and 

thereafter 

to 

the

unclaimed dividend capital revenue account and the account

:2:

may be closed for administrative purposes.

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

report 

of 

the 
Official 
Assignee, 
there 
is 
no 
reason 

why

prayer 

should 
not 
be 
granted. 

Prayer

(a) 

of

the report of the Official Assignee is accordingly
